00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Balanced traveling salesman problem iterative bottleneck
00003  *          algorithm.
00004  *
00005  * Heuristic for solving the balanced traveling salesman problem iterative
00006  * bottleneck algorithm (BalTSP IB-Algorithm).
00007  *
00008  * @author  John LaRusic

00010  ****************************************************************************/

00019 /**
00020  *  @brief  Calculates the best BTSP lower bound
00021  *  @param  problem [in] problem structure
00022  *  @param  lower_bound [out] the best lower bound value
00023  */
00024 int 
00025 btsp_lower_bound(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_problem_info *info, int *lower_bound);
00026 
00027 /**
00028  *  @brief  Calculates BTSP lower bounds for each unique cost
00029  *  @param  problem [in] problem structure
00030  *  @param  info [in] problem info
00031  *  @param  max_index [in/out] largest index to bother searching (can change if
00032  *              lower bounds infeasible for some value)
00033  *  @param  btsp_lbs [out] array of BTSP bounds for each cost
00034  *  @param  best_gap [out] smallest gap bound calculated
00035  *  @param  best_low [out] lower cost value for the best gap bound
00036  *  @param  best_high [out] upper cost value for the best gap bound
00037  *  @param  total_time [out] total time spent calculating lower bound values
00038  */
00039 int
00040 btsp_bounds(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_problem_info *info, int *max_index, 
00041             int *btsp_lbs, int *best_gap, int *best_low, int *best_high, 
00042             double *total_time);
00043 
00044 /**

00046  *  @param  info [in] problem info
00047  *  @param  btsp_lbs [out] array of BTSP bounds for each cost
00048  *  @param  max_index [in] largest index to bother searching
00049  *  @param  tree [out] sorted tree of unique BalTSP lower bounds
00050  */
00051 int
00052 baltsp_bounds_tree(arrow_problem_info *info, int *btsp_lbs, int max_index, 
00053                    arrow_bintree *tree);

00063  *  @param  tiers [out] array of linked lists to be filled
00064  */
00065 int
00066 fill_tiers(arrow_problem_info *info, int *btsp_lbs, int max_index, 
00067            int *baltsp_lb, int num_baltsp_lbs, arrow_llist *tiers);
00068

00074 int

00082 void

00093 int

00096 /****************************************************************************
00097  * Public function implementations
00098  ****************************************************************************/
00099 int 
00100 arrow_balanced_tsp_db(arrow_problem *btsp_problem, 
00101                       arrow_problem *mstsp_problem,
00102                       arrow_problem_info *info,
00103                       arrow_baltsp_params *params,
00104                       arrow_btsp_params *btsp_params,
00105                       double *lb_time,
00106                       arrow_btsp_result *tour_result)
00107 {
00108     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00109     int i, k;
00110     int p1, q1, p2;
00111     int is_feasible;
00112     int best_tour_low, best_tour_high;
00113     int low, high;
00114     int low_val, max;
00115     int min_cost, max_cost;
00116     int best_gap, cur_gap;
00117     int btsp_lb;
00118     double start_time, end_time;
00119     arrow_btsp_fun fun_ib;
00120     arrow_problem *solve_problem;
00121     arrow_problem *solve_problem2;
00122     arrow_problem ib_problem;
00123     arrow_btsp_result cur_tour_result;
00124     
00125     /* Print out debug information */
00126     arrow_debug("With Improvements? %s\n", (params->with_improvements ? "Yes" : "No"));
00127     arrow_debug("BalTSP Lower Bound: %d\n", params->lower_bound);
00128     arrow_debug("BTSP Min Cost: %d\n", params->btsp_min_cost);
00129     arrow_debug("BTSP Max Cost: %d\n", params->btsp_max_cost);
00130     arrow_debug("MSTSP Min Cost: %d\n", params->mstsp_min_cost);
00131     arrow_debug("Total solve steps: %d\n", params->num_steps);
00132     arrow_debug("\n");
00133     
00134     /* For future use, possibly, to handle asymmetric instances */
00135     solve_problem = btsp_problem;
00136     solve_problem2 = mstsp_problem;
00137     
00138     /* Setup result structures */
00139     *lb_time = 0.0;
00140     arrow_btsp_result_init(solve_problem, &cur_tour_result);
00141     tour_result->optimal = ARROW_FALSE;
00142     tour_result->found_tour = ARROW_FALSE;
00143     tour_result->total_time = 0.0;
00144     tour_result->bin_search_steps = 0;
00145     for(i = 0; i < ARROW_TSP_SOLVER_COUNT; i++)
00146     {
00147         tour_result->solver_attempts[i] = 0;
00148         tour_result->solver_time[i] = 0.0;
00149     }    
00150     
00151     /* Find low/high/max values */
00152     low = 0; best_tour_low = 0;
00153     if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, params->btsp_min_cost, &low))
00154     {
00155         arrow_debug("Could not find btsp_min_cost in cost_list\n");
00156         arrow_debug(" - Using low = 0\n");
00157         low = 0;
00158     }
00159     if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, params->btsp_max_cost, &high))
00160     {
00161         arrow_debug("Could not find btsp_max_cost in cost_list\n");
00162         arrow_debug(" - Using high = 0\n");
00163         high = 0;
00164     }
00165     best_tour_low = params->btsp_min_cost;
00166     best_tour_high = params->btsp_max_cost;
00167     
00168     if(best_tour_high - best_tour_low == params->lower_bound)
00169     {
00170         arrow_debug("The BTSP solution is an optimal BalTSP solution!\n");
00171         goto CLEANUP;
00172     }
00173 
00174     if(params->mstsp_min_cost == INT_MAX)
00175         params->mstsp_min_cost = info->max_cost;
00176     if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, params->mstsp_min_cost, &max))
00177     {
00178         arrow_debug("Could not find mstsp_min_cost in cost_list\n");
00179         arrow_debug(" - Using max_cost = %d\n", info->max_cost);
00180         max = info->cost_list_length - 1;
00181     }
00182     
00183     low++;
00184     printf("low = %d; high = %d; max = %d\n", low, high, max);
00185     
00186     
00187     /* Create function for ignoring C[i,j] < low_val */
00188     if(!arrow_baltsp_fun_ib(ARROW_TRUE, &fun_ib))
00189     {
00190         arrow_print_error("Could not create IB transformation function\n");
00191         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00192         goto CLEANUP;
00193     }
00194     
00195     arrow_debug("Starting double bottleneck search\n");
00196     
00197     /* Main loop */
00198     arrow_debug("Starting balanced search [%d,...]\n", info->cost_list[low]);
00199     while((low <= max) && (high < info->cost_list_length))
00200     {
00201         printf("------------------------------------\n");
00202         low_val = info->cost_list[low];
00203         printf("C[i,j] >= %d: \n", low_val);
00204         
00205         tour_result->bin_search_steps++;
00206     
00207         best_gap = best_tour_high - best_tour_low;
00208     
00209         /* Create problem that ignores C[i,j] < low_val */
00210         if(!arrow_btsp_fun_apply(&fun_ib, solve_problem, low_val, info->max_cost, &ib_problem))
00211         {
00212             arrow_print_error("Could not create IB cost matrix\n");
00213             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00214             goto CLEANUP;
00215         }
00216         
00217         /* See if the BTSP lower bound is less than the current gap */
00218         if(!btsp_lower_bound(&ib_problem, info, &btsp_lb))
00219         {
00220             arrow_print_error("Could not solve BTSP lower bounds on IB cost matrix\n");
00221             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00222             goto CLEANUP;
00223         }
00224         
00225         arrow_debug("best_lb - low_val = %d - %d = %d vs best_gap = %d\n",
00226                     btsp_lb, low_val, btsp_lb - low_val, best_gap);
00227         if(btsp_lb - low_val > best_gap)
00228         {
00229             arrow_debug("BTSP lower bound says this index is not worth searching\n");
00230             low++;
00231         }
00232         else
00233         {
00234             start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00235             btsp_params->lower_bound = btsp_lb;
00236             btsp_params->upper_bound = info->max_cost;
00237             
00238             arrow_debug("Starting BTSP search to find upper index\n");
00239             if(!arrow_btsp_solve(&ib_problem, info, btsp_params, &cur_tour_result))
00240             {
00241                 arrow_print_error("Error searching for BTSP tour\n");
00242                 ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00243                 goto CLEANUP;
00244             }
00245             end_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00246             tour_result->total_time += end_time - start_time;
00247 
00248             for(k = 0; k < ARROW_TSP_SOLVER_COUNT; k++)
00249             {
00250                 tour_result->solver_attempts[k] += cur_tour_result.solver_attempts[k];
00251                 tour_result->solver_time[k] += cur_tour_result.solver_time[k];
00252             }
00253         
00254             arrow_problem_destruct(&ib_problem);
00255 
00256             /* See if we improved the best known gap */
00257             if(cur_tour_result.found_tour)
00258             {
00259                 arrow_debug("Tour exists in [%d,%d] = %d\n", cur_tour_result.min_cost, 
00260                     cur_tour_result.max_cost,
00261                     cur_tour_result.max_cost - cur_tour_result.min_cost);
00262         
00263                 /* Find the indices for the min  and max costs in tour */
00264                 if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, cur_tour_result.min_cost, &p1))
00265                 {
00266                     arrow_print_error("Could not find min_cost in cost_list\n");
00267                     ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00268                     goto CLEANUP;
00269                 }
00270                 if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, cur_tour_result.max_cost, &q1))
00271                 {
00272                     arrow_print_error("Could not find min_cost in cost_list\n");
00273                     ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00274                     goto CLEANUP;
00275                 }
00276                 high = q1;
00277         
00278                 cur_gap = cur_tour_result.max_cost - cur_tour_result.min_cost;
00279         
00280                 if(cur_gap < best_gap)
00281                 {
00282                     arrow_debug("Tour is better than the current best solution.\n");
00283                     tour_result->min_cost = cur_tour_result.min_cost;
00284                     tour_result->max_cost = cur_tour_result.max_cost;
00285                     tour_result->tour_length = cur_tour_result.tour_length;
00286                     tour_result->found_tour = ARROW_TRUE;
00287 
00288                     if(tour_result->tour != NULL)
00289                     {
00290                         for(k = 0; k < solve_problem->size; k++)
00291                             tour_result->tour[k] = cur_tour_result.tour[k];
00292                     }
00293 
00294                     best_tour_low = cur_tour_result.min_cost;
00295                     best_tour_high = cur_tour_result.max_cost;
00296             
00297                     if(cur_gap == params->lower_bound)
00298                     {
00299                         arrow_debug("We found a gap equal to the lower bound!\n");
00300                         break;
00301                     }
00302                 }
00303                 else
00304                 {
00305                     arrow_debug("Tour is no better than the current best solution.\n");
00306                 }
00307         
00308                 /* Theorem 1 Improvement */
00309                 if(params->with_improvements)
00310                 {
00311                     if(best_tour_high - best_tour_low + params->mstsp_min_cost <= info->cost_list[high])
00312                     {
00313                         arrow_debug("Tour is heuristically optimal.\n");
00314                         break;
00315                     }
00316                 }
00317         
00318                 /* Solve an MSTSP to see if we can push the lower bound up */
00319                 arrow_debug("Starting MSTSP search to raise lower index\n");
00320             
00321                 /* Create problem that ignores C[i,j] >= low_val */
00322                 if(!arrow_btsp_fun_apply(&fun_ib, solve_problem2, 
00323                                          info->max_cost - info->cost_list[high], 
00324                                          info->max_cost, &ib_problem))
00325                 {
00326                     arrow_print_error("Could not create IB cost matrix\n");
00327                     ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00328                     goto CLEANUP;
00329                 }
00330             
00331                 start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00332                 btsp_params->lower_bound = btsp_lb;
00333                 btsp_params->upper_bound = info->max_cost;
00334                 if(!arrow_btsp_solve(&ib_problem, info, btsp_params, &cur_tour_result))
00335                 {
00336                     arrow_print_error("Error searching for MSTSP tour\n");
00337                     ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00338                     goto CLEANUP;
00339                 }
00340                 end_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00341                 tour_result->total_time += end_time - start_time;
00342         
00343                 p2 = p1;
00344                 if(is_feasible)
00345                 {
00346                     arrow_debug("Found a feasible tour!\n");
00347                     
00348                     /* Conver the MSTSP costs into BTSP costs */
00349                     min_cost = info->max_cost - cur_tour_result.max_cost;
00350                     max_cost = info->max_cost - cur_tour_result.min_cost;
00351                     
00352                     arrow_debug("  - Tour MinCost = %d, MaxCost = %d\n", min_cost, max_cost);
00353         
00354                     best_gap = best_tour_high - best_tour_low;
00355                     cur_gap = max_cost - min_cost; 
00356         
00357                     /* Find the indices for the min cost in tour */
00358                     if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, min_cost, &p2))
00359                     {
00360                         arrow_print_error("Could not find min_cost in cost_list\n");
00361                         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00362                         goto CLEANUP;
00363                     }
00364         
00365                     if(cur_gap < best_gap)
00366                     {
00367                         arrow_debug("Tour is better than the current best solution.\n");
00368             
00369                         /* Copy over new best objective value and tour */
00370                         tour_result->min_cost = min_cost;
00371                         tour_result->max_cost = max_cost;
00372                         tour_result->tour_length = 
00373                             info->max_cost * solve_problem->size - cur_tour_result.tour_length;
00374         
00375                         if(tour_result->tour != NULL)
00376                         {
00377                             tour_result->found_tour = ARROW_TRUE;
00378                             if(solve_problem->symmetric)
00379                             {
00380                                 for(i = 0; i < solve_problem->size; i++)
00381                                     tour_result->tour[i] = cur_tour_result.tour[i];
00382                             }
00383                             else
00384                             {
00385                                 arrow_util_sbtsp_to_abstp_tour(solve_problem, cur_tour_result.tour, 
00386                                                                tour_result->tour);
00387                                 tour_result->tour_length += solve_problem->size * btsp_params->infinity;
00388                             }
00389                         }
00390     
00391                         best_tour_low = min_cost;
00392                         best_tour_high = max_cost;
00393             
00394                         if(cur_gap == params->lower_bound)
00395                         {
00396                             arrow_debug("We found a gap equal to the lower bound!\n");
00397                             break;
00398                         }
00399                     }
00400         
00401                     /* Theorem 1 Improvement */
00402                     if(params->with_improvements)
00403                     {
00404                         if(best_tour_high - best_tour_low + params->mstsp_min_cost <= info->cost_list[high])
00405                         {
00406                             arrow_debug("Tour is heuristically optimal.\n");
00407                             break;
00408                         }
00409                     }
00410                 }
00411         
00412                 if(p2 > p1)
00413                     low = p2 + 1;
00414                 else
00415                     low = p1 + 1;
00416         
00417                 /* Theorem 2 Improvement */
00418                 if(params->with_improvements)
00419                 {
00420                     while(info->cost_list[high] - info->cost_list[low] > best_gap)
00421                         low++;
00422                 }
00423     
00424                 while(info->cost_list[high] - info->cost_list[low] < params->lower_bound)
00425                     high++;
00426         
00427             }
00428             else
00429             {
00430                 arrow_debug("Could not find tour\n");
00431                 arrow_problem_destruct(&ib_problem);
00432                 goto CLEANUP;
00433             }
00434         }
00435         
00436         arrow_problem_destruct(&ib_problem);
00437         arrow_debug("\n");
00438     }
00439     arrow_debug("\n");
00440 
00441 CLEANUP:
00442     arrow_btsp_fun_destruct(&fun_ib);
00443     arrow_btsp_result_destruct(&cur_tour_result);
00444     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00445 }
00446 
00447 
00448 /****************************************************************************
00449  * Private function implementations
00450  ****************************************************************************/
00451 int 
00452 btsp_lower_bound(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_problem_info *info, 
00453                  int *lower_bound)
00454 {
00455     arrow_bound_result result;
00456     
00457     if(!arrow_bbssp_solve(problem, info, &result))
00458     {
00459         arrow_debug("Error finding BBSSP lower bound\n");
00460         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00461     }
00462     *lower_bound = result.obj_value;
00463         
00464     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00465 }
00466 
00467 int
00468 btsp_bounds(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_problem_info *info, int *max_index, 
00469             int *btsp_lbs, int *best_gap, int *best_low, int *best_high, 
00470             double *total_time)
00471 {
00472     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00473     int i;
00474     int cost;
00475     int lb;
00476     int gap;
00477     double start_time;
00478     double end_time;
00479     arrow_btsp_fun fun_ib;
00480     arrow_problem ib_problem;
00481     
00482     /* Create function for ignoring C[i,j] < low_val */
00483     if(!arrow_baltsp_fun_ib(ARROW_TRUE, &fun_ib))
00484     {
00485         arrow_print_error("Could not create IB transformation function\n");
00486         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00487         goto CLEANUP;
00488     }
00489     
00490     *best_gap = INT_MAX;
00491     *total_time = 0.0;
00492     
00493     for(i = 0; i <= *max_index; i++)
00494     {
00495         cost = info->cost_list[i];
00496         
00497         /* Create problem that ignores C[i,j] < low_val */
00498         if(!arrow_btsp_fun_apply(&fun_ib, problem, cost, info->max_cost, &ib_problem))
00499         {
00500             arrow_print_error("Could not create IB cost matrix\n");
00501             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00502             goto CLEANUP;
00503         }
00504         
00505         /* Calculate lower bound */
00506         start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00507         if(!btsp_lower_bound(&ib_problem, info, &lb))
00508         {
00509             arrow_print_error("Error finding BTSP lower bound\n");
00510             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00511             goto CLEANUP;
00512         }
00513         end_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00514         *total_time += (end_time - start_time);
00515         
00516         /* A negative value indicates an infeasible lower bound, so we quit here */
00517         if(lb < 0)
00518         {
00519             arrow_debug("Negative value for the lower bound #%d, so quit\n", i);
00520             arrow_debug("Old Max Index Value: %d\n", *max_index);
00521             *max_index = i - 1;
00522             arrow_debug("New Max Index Value: %d\n", *max_index);
00523             break;
00524         }
00525         
00526         /* Store calculated value for later, update best lower bound */
00527         gap = lb - cost;
00528         btsp_lbs[i] = lb;    
00529         if(gap < *best_gap)
00530         {
00531             *best_low = cost;
00532             *best_high = lb;
00533             *best_gap = gap;
00534         }
00535         
00536         /* Destroy problem */
00537         arrow_problem_destruct(&ib_problem);
00538     }
00539     arrow_debug("\n");
00540 
00541 CLEANUP:
00542     arrow_btsp_fun_destruct(&fun_ib);
00543     return ret;
00544 }
00545 
00546 int
00547 baltsp_bounds_tree(arrow_problem_info *info, int *btsp_lbs, int max_index, 
00548                    arrow_bintree *tree)
00549 {
00550     int i;
00551     
00552     /* Sort the unique gap values */
00553     arrow_bintree_init(tree);        
00554     for(i = 0; i <= max_index; i++)
00555     {    
00556         if(!arrow_bintree_insert(tree, btsp_lbs[i] - info->cost_list[i]))
00557         {
00558             arrow_print_error("Could not sort BalTSP lower bounds");
00559             arrow_bintree_destruct(tree);
00560             return ARROW_FAILURE;
00561         }
00562     }
00563     
00564     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00565 }
00566 
00567 int
00568 fill_tiers(arrow_problem_info *info, int *btsp_lbs, int max_index, 
00569            int *baltsp_lb, int num_baltsp_lbs, arrow_llist *tiers)
00570 {
00571     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00572     int i;
00573     int cost;
00574     int gap;
00575     int idx;
00576     arrow_hash hash;
00577     arrow_llist *list;
00578     
00579     /* Create a hash of the unique values */
00580     if(!arrow_hash_cost_list(baltsp_lb, num_baltsp_lbs, &hash))
00581     {
00582         arrow_print_error("Could not create hash of unique BalTSP bounds");
00583         goto CLEANUP;
00584     }
00585     
00586     for(i = 0; i <= max_index; i++)
00587     {
00588         cost = info->cost_list[i];
00589         gap = btsp_lbs[i] - cost;
00590         idx = arrow_hash_search(&hash, gap);
00591         
00592         list = &(tiers[idx]);
00593         arrow_llist_insert_tail(list, i);
00594     }
00595 
00596 CLEANUP:
00597     arrow_hash_destruct(&hash);
00598     return ret;
00599 }
00600 
00601 int
00602 init_tiers(int num_tiers, arrow_llist **tiers)
00603 {
00604     int i;
00605     arrow_llist *tier;
00606     
00607     /* Allocate memory */
00608     if((*tiers = malloc(num_tiers * sizeof(arrow_llist))) == NULL)
00609     {
00610         arrow_print_error("Error allocating memory for array of linked lists.");
00611         *tiers = NULL;
00612         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00613     }
00614     
00615     /* Initialize lists */
00616     for(i = 0; i < num_tiers; i++)
00617     {
00618         tier = &((*tiers)[i]);
00619         arrow_llist_init(tier);
00620     }
00621     
00622     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00623 }
00624 
00625 void
00626 destruct_tiers(int num_tiers, arrow_llist **tiers)
00627 {
00628     int i;
00629     arrow_llist *tier;
00630     
00631     if(*tiers != NULL)
00632     {
00633         for(i = 0; i < num_tiers; i++)
00634         {
00635             tier = &((*tiers)[i]);
00636             arrow_llist_destruct(tier);
00637         }
00638         free(*tiers);
00639     }
00640 }
00641 
00642 int
00643 find_cost_order(arrow_problem_info *info, int max_index, int *btsp_lbs, int *cost_order)
00644 {
00645     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00646     int i, k;
00647     int idx;
00648     int *baltsp_lbs;
00649     int num_tiers;
00650     arrow_llist *tier;
00651     arrow_llist *tiers;
00652     arrow_bintree tree;
00653         
00654     /* Find a list of unique BalTSP lower bounds */
00655     if(!baltsp_bounds_tree(info, btsp_lbs, max_index, &tree))
00656     {
00657         arrow_print_error("Could not create BalTSP bounds list");
00658         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00659     }
00660     
00661     /* Create array for holding Balanced TSP lower bounds */
00662     if(!arrow_util_create_int_array(tree.size, &baltsp_lbs))
00663     {
00664         arrow_print_error("Could not create baltsp_lbs array\n");
00665         baltsp_lbs = NULL;
00666         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00667         goto CLEANUP;
00668     }
00669     
00670     /* Convert tree to an array */
00671     arrow_bintree_to_array(&tree, baltsp_lbs);
00672     num_tiers = tree.size;
00673     
00674     /* Create and fill the list of tiers with costs corresponding to each 
00675        BalTSP lower bound */
00676     if(!init_tiers(num_tiers, &tiers))
00677     {
00678         arrow_print_error("Could not create tiers of linked lists");
00679         tiers = NULL;
00680         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00681         goto CLEANUP;
00682     }
00683     if(!fill_tiers(info, btsp_lbs, max_index, baltsp_lbs, num_tiers, tiers))
00684     {
00685         arrow_print_error("Could not fill tiers of linked lists");
00686         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00687         goto CLEANUP;
00688     }
00689     
00690     /* Fill cost_order according to order in tiers */
00691     i = 0;
00692     for(k = 0; k < num_tiers; k++)
00693     {
00694         tier = &(tiers[k]);
00695         while(tier->size > 0)
00696         {
00697             arrow_llist_remove_head(tier, &idx);
00698             cost_order[i] = idx;
00699             i++;
00700         }
00701     }
00702 
00703     /*
00704     arrow_debug("Cost index order: ");
00705     for(i = 0; i <= max_index; i++)
00706         arrow_debug("%d, ", cost_order[i]);
00707     arrow_debug("EOL\n\n");
00708     */
00709          
00710 CLEANUP:
00711     free(baltsp_lbs);
00712     destruct_tiers(num_tiers, &tiers);
00713     arrow_bintree_destruct(&tree);
00714     return ret;
00715 }
